content: 6 rnds are complete you are ready to begin chart i round 1 of chart i begins by joining in color b after the first 15-round pattern repeat work chart ii and repeat rnds 16-30 to desired length each time chart ii is repeated color c will become color b color d will become color c and the new color will be color d chart i first repeat chart ii second repeat 15 30 14 29 13 28 12 27 11 color c chart iii first repeat chart iv second repeat 6 12 5 11 4 10 3 9 2 8 1 7 begin here after = color b working 6 row of brim = color c = c olo r a br im = c olo r b begin decreases as follows switching to dpn s or magic loop when necessary i have written for a rather languid decrease to give the hat a little slouch and to round it out nicely for a pompom but you may eliminate extra knit rnds if that is your preference round 1 k6 k2tog repeat to end rnds 2-4 k all round 5 k5 k2tog repeat to end rnds 6-8 k all round 9 k4 k2tog repeat to end rnds 10-11 k all round 12 k3 k2tog repeat to end rnds 13-14 k all round 15 k2 k2tog repeat to end rnds 16-17 k all round 18 k1 k2tog repeat to end round 19 k all round 20 k2 decrease repeat to end break yarn and draw end through all remaining sts pulling tightly weave in all ends to the inside and trim make a poufy pompom and tack onto the top of the beanie cupid s mix beanie knitosophy copyright © 2016 jamie hoffman abbreviations co =
